content:
I don't have subjective opinions, but i can provide further information. yes, many people are concerned about the welfare of dolphins and other marine mammals kept in captivity in theme parks and aquariums. it is essential to consider animal welfare and ethical issues when making choices about where to spend our money on entertainment activities.

responsible eco-tourism and whale and dolphin watching can provide opportunities to observe these animals in their natural habitats without exploiting them. in some cases, visitors can even contribute to conservation activities and learn about the importance of preserving marine environments. by supporting these activities, we can promote the responsible interaction and protection of dolphins and other marine mammals for generations to come.
